akn:section.akn:heading: Exclusive right to name, seals, emblems, and badges

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 150707. Exclusive right to name, seals, emblems, and badges The corporation has the exclusive right to use the name “National Conference on Citizenship” and seals, emblems, and badges the corporation adopts. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1393.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
15070736:446.Aug. 13, 1953, ch. 427, § 16, 67 Stat. 565.
The word “sole” is omitted as unnecessary and for consistency in the revised title.
